article: slapped by a raw wind whipping off the icy cornfields , emil bertolini , ## , stepped across the frozen earth on his way to see a model home at sun city , the retirement haven better known for arizona sunshine than illinois snowdrifts .
abstract: for seniors with roots retirement homes head north
